alert.note: Alert for Potter (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 2:47PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Potter County through 415 PM CDT... At 346 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Whitlocks Bay Rec Area, or 11 miles northwest of Gettysburg, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of western Potter County, including the following locations... Lake Oahe. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
